Summary
TheLedge
Constants
LEFTLEFT KEY CODE : 37
RIGHTRIGHT KEY CODE : 39
DOWNDOWN KEY CODE : 40
UPUP KEY CODE : 38
SPACEBARSPACEBAR KEY CODE : 32
RANGED_ATTACKZ KEY CODE : 90
PHYSICAL_ATTACKX KEY CODE : 88
GAME_WIDTHGame width in pixels : 400
GAME_HEIGHTGame height in pixels : 600
Variables
leftButtonThe left button is being pressed or not
rightButtonThe right button is being pressed or not
upButtonThe up button is being pressed or not
downButtonThe down button is being pressed or not
spacebarButtonThe spacebar button is being pressed or not
rangedAttackButtonThe button is being pressed or not
physicalAttackButtonThe button is being pressed or not
gameTimeThe over all game time
rootDisplayA link to the root display object.
playerThe main player of the game.
xmlDataAn XML Object used to input variables into the game at run-time.
level_1The first level.
Functions
TheLedgeThe Ledge constructor - Loads the debugger properties and loads the XML file.
startGameAdds the keyboard listeners and game loop event, creates a new game.
gameLoopThe Main Game Loop, this is called as fast as AS3 can.
loadXMLLoads the XML file, GameVars.xml.
xmlLoadedWhen the XML file is loaded, this function is called internally.
errorDisplayOutput text to the debugging console
indentDebuggerIndent the debugger to make it easier to ready for specific lists
debuggerPropertiesSet the debugger properties
keyupFunctionEverytime a key is lifted up, call this function
keydownFunctionEverytime a key is pressed down, call this function
showChildrenShows all the children of a specific display object
printInfoPrint all the Ledge info to the debugging console

Functions

TheLedge

public function TheLedge()

The Ledge constructor - Loads the debugger properties and loads the XML file.

Returns

N/A

startGame

private function startGame():void

Adds the keyboard listeners and game loop event, creates a new game.

Returns

N/A

gameLoop

private function gameLoop(event: Event):void

The Main Game Loop, this is called as fast as AS3 can.

Parameters

param event The Enter Frame listener object.

Returns

N/A

loadXML

private function loadXML()

Loads the XML file, GameVars.xml.  Upon being loaded, the game will continue to load its additional components.

Returns

N/A

xmlLoaded

private function xmlLoaded(event: Event)

When the XML file is loaded, this function is called internally.

Parameters

param event Event Complete notification of the XML file is completly loaded.

Returns

N/A

errorDisplay

private function errorDisplay(arg: *):void

Output text to the debugging console

Parameters

argThe output to the debugger

indentDebugger

private function indentDebugger(indentArg: uint):void

Indent the debugger to make it easier to ready for specific lists

Parameters

indentArgHow many spaces to indent the debugger line

debuggerProperties

private function debuggerProperties(isEditable: Boolean)

Set the debugger properties

Parameters

isEditablePass true if you want the debugger to be editable, false otherwise

keyupFunction

public function keyupFunction(event: KeyboardEvent):void

Everytime a key is lifted up, call this function

Parameters

eventThe keyboard event

keydownFunction

public function keydownFunction(event: KeyboardEvent):void

Everytime a key is pressed down, call this function

Parameters

eventThe keyboard event

showChildren

function showChildren(dispObj: *):void

Shows all the children of a specific display object

Parameters

dispObjThe Display Object to print its children to the debugging console

printInfo

public function printInfo():void

Print all the Ledge info to the debugging console
